attributes.action: Petition for Optional Homework, Prioritizing GCSE Coursework
attributes.additional_details: We seek a change in homework policies to reduce student stress and focus on meaningful learning. This adjustment ensures that GCSE coursework remains a vital part of education, promoting in-depth understanding while giving students a healthier work-life balance.
attributes.background: Revise homework policies to make daily homework optional while preserving the importance of GCSE coursework in education.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

It is not clear if you would like homework for GCSE coursework to be allowed.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Ban homework except for GCSE coursework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387
